 Converts a bmp file to RGBA texture and loads it to a material.
int NE_MaterialTexLoadBMPtoRGB256 (NE_Material *tex, NE_Palette *pal, void *pointer, bool transpcolor)
 Converts a bmp file in RAM to RGB256 texture and loads it in a texture and a palette struct.

Detailed Description

Right now, there are only functions to convert BMP images into DS textures. They support BMP of 4, 8, 16 (X1RGB5) and 24 bits.

Function Documentation

int NE_FATMaterialTexLoadBMPtoRGB256 ( NE_Material *  tex,
NE_Palette *  pal,
char *  filename,
bool  transpcolor 
)

Converts a bmp file in FAT to RGB256 texture and loads it in a texture and a palette struct.

Parameters:
tex Material struct to hold the data.
pal Palette struct to hold the data.
filename Path to the bmp file. Format must be 8 or 4 bit.
transpcolor If true, palette color 0 will be transparent.

int NE_FATMaterialTexLoadBMPtoRGBA ( NE_Material *  tex,
char *  filename,
bool  transpcolor 
)

Converts a bmp file in FAT to RGBA texture and loads it to a material.

Parameters:
tex Material to hold the texture.
filename Path to a bmp file in FAT. Format must be 16bit(X1RGB5) or 24 bit.
transpcolor If true, pixel 0 color will be transparent.

NE_Palette *  pal,

bool  transpcolor

Converts a bmp file in RAM to RGB256 texture and loads it in a texture and a palette struct.

Parameters:
tex Material struct to hold the data.
pal Palette struct to hold the data.
pointer Pointer to the bmp file. Format must be 8 or 4 bit.
transpcolor If true, palette color 0 will be transparent.
